Welcome! Kalamazoo Industries, Inc. manufactures abrasive saws, belt sanders, 5C fixtures and vibratory finishers here in Kalamazoo, Michigan since 1960. Most standard products can be modified to suit your specific needs. Special machines can also be made to your specifications.
